item.title: How to help victims of deadly Texas floods
item.description: Organizations and local brands have jumped into action to help victims of the deadly Texas floods that began in Hill Country on Friday.

item.title: WATCH: Moment a Utah strip mall explodes after vehicle crash
item.description: Eyewitness video captured the dramatic moment when a large explosion tore through a strip mall in Utah.
